casebody.data:
IN RE: CONDEMNATION BY the REDEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF the CITY OF YORK Appropriating in Fee Simple Certain Lands of John E. and Joyce E. Gearhart Located at 319 Chestnut Street, in the City of York, York County, Pennsylvania Parcel No. 12-350-01-0003.00-00000 Petition of: Redevelopment Authority of the City of York No. 248 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 15, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 15th day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
